concept.title: Resource Monitor
concept.shortdesc: Monitor the CPU usage, memory usage, disk utilization and network flow.

conbody.p: You can go to Resource Monitor to check the information or click the shortcut icon at the right-top corner.

section.title: Information
section.p: Check the basic information of the PBX.

ul.li: System Time: The current time on the PBX.
Uptime: The system up time since the last reboot.
Extensions/Max Extensions: The number of added extensions/Maximum number of extensions allowed to be added

section.title: Network
section.p: Check the status of local network, cellular network, and VPN network.

section.title: Performance
section.p: Check the performance of CPU, Memory and local network.

section.title: Storage Usage
section.p: Check the usage of local storage in the PBX. If you set up an external storage, you can also check the storage usage on this page.
